Please know that we are working diligently in an effort to provide you guidance on the upcoming school year. Health and educational requirements/recommendations are changing at an almost daily rate across the State and Nation and those changes are effecting what we do here at Southland ISD.
As soon as we have a plan in place, it will be shared with everyone immediately. I feel the plan has to be complete and comprehensive in order to be effective and to not cause added confusion to an already frustrating situation.
I have already seen some districts across the State retracting the reopening plans they had issued due to the shifting landscape of the situation or due to the pressure to release something and rushing to get it out before it was complete.
I understand that time is getting shorter with each passing day, but please be patient. We are striving hard to do what is the absolute best and safest thing for our kids, teachers and families.
